transArray.content: The room is very good, with advanced equipment, including automatic curtains, smart toilets, Xiaodu Butler, takeaway robots, and washing machines and dryers. The service attitude is very good and everything is answered. Breakfast was delicious. Very close to the subway station and convenient transportation.

Meeting is the best time. Satisfaction once is not our goal. We hope that you will be satisfied every time you stay! We will continue to provide quality service to our guests, look forward to your visit again, and wish you a happy life.
